          text run at (0,0) width 520: "Here's the HTML test case, extracted from the Netcenter Address Book page. At "
          text run at (519,0) width 235: "the top of the address book is a \"tool"
          text run at (0,18) width 193: "bar\" with options like \"New,\" "
          text run at (192,18) width 474: "\"Directory,\" \"Sign-out,\" \"Customize,\" etc. These are areas in a client side "
          text run at (665,18) width 106: "image map. You"
          text run at (0,36) width 407: "should be able to click on these areas of the map, including the "
          text run at (406,36) width 376: "areas on the right side of the map. However, in NGLayout,"
          text run at (0,54) width 129: "the right side of the "
          text run at (128,54) width 463: "map isn't \"clickable\" -- the cursor doesn't change and the link cannot be "
          text run at (590,54) width 79: "\"activated.\" "
          text run at (668,54) width 44: "I think"
          text run at (0,72) width 478: "somewhere we're miscalculating where the imagemap's areas are, because "
          text run at (477,72) width 255: "the areas on the left still work, although"
          text run at (0,90) width 240: "clicking on them sometimes crashes. "
          text run at (239,90) width 449: "It's as though NGLayout thinks the Imagemap areas are located a few "
          text run at (687,90) width 96: "hundred pixels"
          text run at (0,108) width 70: "to the left. "
